data.actual_result: The first video continues playing in the second embed. The remaining embed has URL 2's title and URL 1's video.
data.expected_result: The first video, now escaped, should stop playing and be removed from the message.
data.short_description: Escaping a playing native video embed doesn't halt playback
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a text channel where you have link embed permissions. - Send one message containing URLs to two videos which are both handled by Discord's native player (e.g., Streamable; for ease of replication, use paths "/l7bid" and "/bydom") - Once sent, both videos are embedded below the message. - Play the first video. - While the first video is playing, edit your message, adding lt and gt symbols ("<" and ">") around the first URL. Press enter to confirm the edit.
